summary.Title: EMPLOYEES FOR KNITTING TECHNICAL TEXTILES
summary.Presentation: We are looking for a full-time employee as soon as possible, 37 hours per week for our Warp knitted and Raschel knitted technical textile fabric. But we are gladly waiting for the right person. We

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a full-time employee as soon as possible, 37 hours per week for our Warp knitted and Raschel knitted technical textile fabric. But we are gladly waiting for the right person. We are placed in DK-7400 Herning, Denmark.

The work consists of:

  • Preparation and setup of yarns
  • Supervision and corrections of knit errors at the knitting machines
  • Knitting with different existing, and new qualities/patterns
  • Maintenance and general cleaning in the knitting plant.

We expect you have:

  • Technical understanding
  • Practical sense and good mechanical understanding
  • Understanding of rapid conversion of production
  • Innovative
  • Good sense of order and in a good physical sharp
  • EU Driving license and forklift certificate
  • PC-user

Knowledge of Danish and German language an advantage.
Variable work hours can occur for some periods.
You will have influence on your own workflow and be
responsible for deadlines.

You can expect:

  • Working conditions according to Danish law
  • Salary according to qualifications
  • Good social conditions
  • Flat organization

Please sent job application to gitte@ellerbaek.dk
If you have any questions, you are welcome to call Lars Ellerbæk +45 40186977
